examples: She rode her bicycle to work.
He fell off his bicycle and scraped his knee.
The bicycle race will start in an hour.
Ela foi de bicicleta para o trabalho.
Ele caiu da bicicleta e ralou o joelho.
A corrida de bicicleta começará em uma hora.

suggested: Why couldn't the bicycle stand up by itself? Because it was two-tired!
An abandoned bicycle can be a symbol of loss or abandonment.
Frustration can arise from a stolen or broken bicycle, or from reckless or inconsiderate behavior from other cyclists or drivers.
Did you know that bicycles are actually more energy-efficient than cars, making them a great option for environmentally-friendly transportation?
There's no specific smell associated with bicycles, but the scent of fresh air and the outdoors may be evoked when riding.
The feeling of wind in your hair and the sun on your skin while riding a bicycle can be invigorating.
Bicycles can be connected to freedom, independence, exercise, and a sense of community with other cyclists.
